Candidate Profile Description.summary: Aravinda is a masters student in Computer Science with a specialization in Data Science, Neural Networks, and Automated Learning. He is proficient in Python, R, and SQL among other languages and has experience with a number of machine learning techniques and libraries. Aravinda has a number of certifications in Deep Learning and Machine Learning, and has undertaken a variety of internships and projects where he has developed and implemented AI solutions. He's a published researcher, innovative problem solver, and dedicated team player.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology, Information Technology (Minor: Big Data Analytics)

experience.company: Center for Artificial Intelligence & Robotics Lab (DRDO)
experience.title: Deep Learning Research Intern
responsibilities: Pioneered Temporal Graph Neural Network (Temporal GNN) technique, integrating temporal data, graph structure.
Surpassed state-of-the-art model with 2% dynamic link classification improvement.
Designed an advanced framework by merging BERT with Temporal GNN.
Attained exceptional language model perplexity of 3.19, outperforming state-of-the-art's 3.40 score, highlighting strong language pattern understanding and modeling skills.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
responsibilities: Led a team of 4 to utilize predictive algorithms.
Analyzed a dataset of 16M+ rows of Home-Depot sales data using PySpark and other Python machine learning tools.
Delivered pricing recommendations for high-demand products like appliances & wires.
Honored with the Stellar Team Award.

experience.title: AI Research Assistant
responsibilities: Developed a Bone Age Assessment model.
Devised a deep-learning model to predict the channel link quality.
Leveraged MLflow to meticulously track diverse models
Designed and deployed LSTM and Bidirectional LSTM networks.

projects.name: Diabetes Prognosis using Machine Learning
projects.description: Showcased research at the esteemed IEEE ICIRCA 2022 Conference, detailing an improved diabetes classification model.

projects.name: Lane Detection Algorithm for Autonomous Vehicles
projects.description: Developed a robust algorithm by synergizing the SegNet and LSTM deep learning architectures.

projects.name: Chest X-Ray-Based COVID Detection Model
projects.description: Developed a CNN model using chest X-ray images to classify pneumonia (Corona) patients from healthy individuals.

projects.name: CycleGAN for Image-to-Image Translation
projects.description: Rebuilt the Cycle Generative Adversarial Network using TensorFlow to transfer the characteristics of one image to another.
